Text: Y-You won't believe this! In the forestâ€”
Ah, Boss man is here!

Delta seems flustered, but when she notices Cid,
she changes direction and bounds toward him.
Wh-Whoa!
Thank you for everything, Boss!
Yeah, don't mention it. Ah, there, there.
Heheh!
So what happened to you?
Right! Let me explain.

I was looking for some rare stuff for Boss. I went to
the Abyss Woods, 'cause rare stuff is in dangerous
places, right?
The Abyss Woods... I'm shocked you didn't get lost.
I thought I could find something rare there...

Ah, but I did get lost, so I had to go into survival
mode for a couple of days... *sniff*

So I was going here and there looking for a way out,
and I found a huge, freaky boar!
A huge, freaky boar?
I see. But you could handle it, right Delta?
Absolutely! I'm the strongest there is!

But I thought, if the boar went on a rampage, then the
trees might fall over and make a huge mess, so I came
back. I'm so thoughtful!

I'm surprised, but good job. I wonder if regular
discipline has finally paid off.

I knew Boss would be here today, so I made sure to
not cause any trouble. Heheh!
So you mean you don't have to be careful around me?
Eek! It was just a speech figure!
I remember its smell, so I can probably track it!

Can you track it, or not...? Anyways, we need to act
quickly, before something happens. Let's follow Delta.

But the boar could be luring us into a trap. We don't
know its aim, so let's split up.

Epsilon, Gamma. Can you tell Zeta and Eta to stay
here with you?
Understood.
We will join you immediately if needed.
All right. I'll go with Beta and Delta. And...

Alpha turns to Cid, struggling to say something.
Cid notices this.
(Riiiight.)
Mind if I tag along? I won't get in the way.

(This might be part of their act. It could lead to
a surprise or something.)

(It feels like they're forcing this a bit, but it's my job
to go along with whatever they have set up for me.)
O-Of course! Thank you!
Great. Okay, let's go.
We're pretty deep into the forest.
Yes, the fog is thick, too. How much further, Delta?
*sniff, sniff*... We're close! Oh! Over there!
Hmm, is this place...

It's definetly a "huge, freaky boar"... It has white
fur and massive horns. What strange features.
I can take it! Can I give it a go?
Delta, stay.

Don't forget, we have Cid with us, and that boar is
certainly more powerful than it looks.

That's why we need more information before we
engage it. There could be more enemies here
than just the boar.

R-Right! I'll let Beta take care of the
difficult stuff!
Yeah, yeah... I'm already aware of that.

From this distance, I can't tell if it's a monster or
an animal. It's the largest creature I've seen since
the Mist Dragon.

When we entered the Abyss Woods for the first time,
my speculation wasâ€”

Thought they'd have more backbone living in such a
dangerous forest.

True, the monsters are displaying fewer signs of
mutation than I anticipated.
Mutation...?
...Um, explain it a little simpler!

Let's see... The Abyss Woods is overflowing with
poisonous fog.

We've been trying to avoid it as we make our way
through the woods.

But the monsters we've encountered haven't adapted
to the fog and live their lives avoiding its poison.

In other words, the fog hasn't been around for long
since the monsters haven't had enough time to
adapt to it.

If the monsters haven't adapted...does that mean the
fog isn't natural?!
I don't remember that.
...I figured.
Hmph. That felt like a snappy remark.

Back then, I hypothesized that not enough time had
passed for any adaptations to occur.

But time has passed, and monsters have now mutated
and adapted to the toxic fog. What do you think of my
theory, Lady Alpha?

I think you're right, Beta. That's definitely one
possibility.
I dunno what you mean, but I think you're right!

There are no strong magical traces, and there's not
much of a chance it's anyone's pet. Lady Alpha, on
your signalâ€”
I've got another theory.
Hmm? Master Shadow?

If your hypothesis is correct, there could be several
of these monsters.
Ah...

But Delta saw only one. It'd be normal to see others
after being here for two days.
Right, I only saw this one!
I see...

So it's possible that the boar is a monster that
someone created on purpose, right?
Ugh... I still have much to learn about theorizing...

Amazing, Master Shadow! I can't believe you came up
with another possibility so quickly!
Shadow...you already have it figured out, don't you?
I'm not so sure...

(Honestly, I'm impressed with their performances.
This surprise hunting event has been entertaining.)

(It's too bad, I really want to be on board with the
whole surprise thing, but I also want to let them
know I saw through their charade.)

(If I do that, their performances and ability to
surprise will get better. It's harsh, but that's
tough love.)

(There's something fishy about that boar. They must
have caught it somewhere and transported here, or
maybe it's one of Eta's experiments...)

(I'm sure the others members are watching me, waiting
to see my reaction. Sorry, girls.)
Right...?

Cid looks at the sky and mumbles to himself.
And thenâ€”
Whoa!

The Abyss Woods rustles loudly. It is as if the forest
is speaking.
Could this be...?!
(Okay, it's time to get to the bottom of thingsâ€”)
The Mist Dragon...?

I can only guess, but other than us, he's the only
one who can do whatever he wants in this forest.
Does this mean that the boar is the Mist Dragon?
No, but that's not a bad guess.
Maybe he created...a special entity.

Then it's time for a revenge match! No excuses,
no matter what monster it is! Graah!

We're stronger than before, so make sure to watch
closely, Master Shadow!
Okay... Go for it.
